item.title: Creamy Southwest Chicken Chili
item.description: This recipe makes 6 servings. Ingredients 1 1/3 pounds Chicken breast 1 can Corn 1 can Black Beans 1 Red Bell Pepper 1/2 Yellow Onion 2 cups Chicken Broth 9 tsp (1 pkt) Hidden Valley Ranch Seasoning 8 oz Cottage Cheese, regular, 4% Steps Combine everything except for the cottage cheese into a crockpot, cook on low for 4-6 hours. Once 6 hours has passed, remove and shred the chicken breasts, add them back into the crockpot with the cottage cheese.
